b9452703-f744-4c68-8daa-849f3df3e084:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b9452703-f744-4c68-8daa-849f3df3e084","title":{"en":"Slum Wolf  ~Tadao Tsuge Outlaw Selection~ - Volume 4"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"狼の伝説～つげ忠男アウトロー選集4～"},{"ja-ro":"Ookami no Densetsu -Tsuge Tadao Outlaw Senshu-"},{"en":"Legend of the Wolf"}],"lastChapter":"9","description":{"en":"(from ebookjapan):\n\nNight. A man is alone, sheltering from the rain on a dreary street corner. He lights a cigarette. The cuteness of the dragon kids and the life lessons they learn will capture many readers."},"links":{"al":"61007","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00ZEIG5DY","ap":"corseltel-no-ryuujitsushi-monogatari","bw":"series/4053/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/124838/","kt":"1903","mal":"31007","mu":"12990"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"dd1f77c5-dea9-4e2b-97ae-224af09caf99","name":{"en":"Monster Girls"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

Quando seus companheiros de quarto voltam e o encontram com uma mulher no local, ele é imediatamente expulso e jogado na rua. b9cb6734-7ced-433c-b868-1da65fe6ff09:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b9cb6734-7ced-433c-b868-1da65fe6ff09","title":{"en":"Surviving as a Player"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"플레이어로 살아남는 방법"},{"en":"How To Survive As A Player"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Beta testing is over! The official server is the real world! ‘Elix’ empire building and cultivating game with many secrets hidden behind the curtain. In this game the player becomes ‘king,’ and rules over the country with their vassals. Before playing the player takes an aptitude test to determine his race. When the player is given a race and enters the game, they are given a helpful vassal called the ‘duke.’ That was how, ‘Elix,’ the empire building game, started. Elix is an extremely difficult game that cautions players against being tyrannical, lazy, or heartless when establishing an empire, or risk the empire collapsing due to riots, coups, and assassinations. An empire can also be destroyed by being invaded by another player. Still, many people were very excited and became obsessed with Elix. The open beta test lasted six months, after which the news of the official service was announced to the world. It generated a lot of excitement and anticipation from many people. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god.
